department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: The National Forest Inventory program in the Canadian Forest Service requires high resolution satellite imagery for use by the program and its collaborators.
description: The National Forest Inventory (NFI) program in the Canadian Forest Service (CFS) of Natural Resources Canada(NRCan) in Victoria BC requires high resolution satellite imagery for use by the program and its Federal, Provincial and Territorial collaborators.
tags: Still Photography Services, Studio Photography Services, Panchromatic Satellite Imagery, Multi-spectral Satellite Imagery, High Resolution Satellite Imagery, Satellite Imaging Services
full_summary:
Azure# PolyStar
===============

An announcement regarding the national forest inventory program in the Canadian Forest Service of Natural Resources Canada in Victoria, British Columbia, invites a bid for satellite imagery services. The Imperial Reference Number for this tender is 23145-240822, and the publication date is set for April 18th, 2024. Solicitations close on May 13th, 2024, at 14:00:00.

**Project Brief**
---------------

The contract is for a Request for Proposal (RFP) covering a comprehensive plan for acquiring panchromatic and very high resolution multi-spectral satellite images for the national forest inventory program. The client specifies minimum completion quality indicators such as 70 cm or better (i.e., =70 cm) panchromatic results and multispectral data quality that can meet requirements listed in the referenced document.

**Eligibility Criteria**
-----------------------

Unlock qualified service providers from across Canada, offering the opportunity for Canadian businesses to compete for this requisition. Each provider must finalize an application that includes a combination of the following: qualifications to meet requirements, individual offer detail, services requested, proposal date, unsubstantiated claims, implicit contract, integrity agreements, geographic location, general industry Standard Codes, Dispute resolution strategy, vendor prerequisites, solicited consultants.

**Key Specifications**
---------------------

Key agreement details include the Department of Public Works and Government Services of the Government of Canada in Phases III Place du Portage, Gatineau Quebec, issuing an official letter of document acknowledgment. Further details are sought from providers such as Military Classes, Response document Codes for products, appropriate testing scenarios, Analysis unit Outcome evaluation.

### Important Dates
-------------------

-   Publication date: April 19th, 2024
-   Closing Date of Bidding: May 13th, 2024
-   Amendment Date: May 6th, 2024
